original_text: Moses carefully checked all the work. He saw that the workers had done it exactly as the Lord had commanded them.
korean_text: 모세가 그 마친 모든 것을 본즉 여호와께서 명령하신 대로 되었으므로 모세가 그들에게 축복하였더라

sentences.original_text: Moses carefully checked all the work.
He saw that the workers had done it exactly
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 일꾼들이 그것을 정확히 수행했음을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded them.
